subject: order #SSN3743
description_text:
Good afternoon,
I recently ordered the simpson pro x Ultra pedals with baseplate and the
VAM pro linear motor haptics. I just received the haptics but have not
gotten any confirmation on the pedals.
Can I get some more info on when they are expected to arrive?
the order number is #SSN3743

Kind regards,
Robin Dijt

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8292 中
